class.name: GaussNewtonOptimizer

javadoc.text:
Gauss-Newton least-squares solver. *

* This class solve a least-square problem by solving the normal equations * of the linearized problem at each iteration. Either LU decomposition or * QR decomposition can be used to solve the normal equations. LU decomposition * is faster but QR decomposition is more robust for difficult problems. *
Simple constructor with default settings. * The normal equations will be solved using LU decomposition and the * convergence check is set to a {@link SimpleVectorValueChecker}with default tolerances.
Simple constructor with default settings. * The normal equations will be solved using LU decomposition.
Simple constructor with default settings. * The convergence check is set to a {@link SimpleVectorValueChecker}with default tolerances.
javadoc.param: useLU If {@code true}, the normal equations will be solved * using LU decomposition, otherwise they will be solved using QR * decomposition.
useLU If {@code true}, the normal equations will be solved * using LU decomposition, otherwise they will be solved using QR * decomposition.

method.name: doOptimize
method.comment: Computation will be useless without a checker (see "for-loop").
evaluate the objective function and its jacobian
Value of the objective function at "currentPoint".
build the contribution matrix for measurement i
solve the linearized least squares problem
